debates.showAs: Transparency and Social Value in Public Procurement Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Transparency and Social Value in Public Procurement Bill 2024: Second Stage [Private Members]
Transparency and Social Value in Public Procurement Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to give further effect to Directive 2014/24/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 26 February 2014 and for that purpose to provide for certain reporting functions in relation to procurements to which that Directive applies, to amend the Companies Act 2014 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt tuilleadh éifeachta do Threoir 2014/24/AE ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus ón gComhairle an 26 Feabhra 2014 agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le feidhmeanna tuairiscithe áirithe i ndáil le sainfháil a bhfuil feidhm ag an Treoir sin maidir léi, do leasú Acht na gCuideachtaí, 2014 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Transparency and Social Value in Public Procurement Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thrédhearcacht agus Luach Sóisialta i Sainfháil Phoiblí, 2024

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Bill 2024: Second Stage [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Standards in Public Office (Amendment) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make certain amendments to the Standards in Public Office Act 2001 and the Ethics in Public Office Act 1995; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh leasuithe áirithe ar an Acht um Chaighdeáin in Oifigí Poiblí, 2001 agus ar an Acht um Eitic in Oifigí Poiblí,1995; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chaighdeáin in Oifigí Poiblí (Leasú), 2023

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Protected Disclosures Act 2014 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Nochtadh Cosanta, 2014 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Freedom of Information (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Freedom of Information (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Freedom of Information (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Freedom of Information Act 2014 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shaoráil Faisnéise, 2014 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Regulation of Tenderers Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed)
Regulation of Tenderers Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Regulation of Tenderers Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide that abnormally low tender bids for construction works with a contract equal to or above the EU threshold for public works are regulated, and disqualified, if their low level is not adequately explained to the relevant authority, and that performance in prior public contracts be grounds for exclusion from participation in a procurement procedure.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú go ndéanfar tairiscintí a imthairgeadh ar leibhéal foríseal i ndáil le hoibreacha foirgníochta lena ngabhann conradh atá ar comhleibhéal le tairseach AE maidir le hoibreacha poiblí, nó os a chionn sin, a rialáil, agus a dhícháiliú mura dtugtar míniú leordhóthanach ar leibhéal foríseal na dtairiscintí sin don údarás iomchuí, agus go mbeidh feidhmíocht i dtaca le conarthaí poiblí roimhe sin ina foras le haghaidh eisiamh ó rannpháirtíocht i nós imeachta sainfhála.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thairgeoirí a Rialáil, 2021

debates.showAs: Regulation of Lobbying (Amendment) Bill 2020: Referral to Select Committee
Regulation of Lobbying (Amendment) Bill 2020: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Regulation of Lobbying (Amendment) Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for amendments to the Regulation of Lobbying Act 2015, to extend the definition of persons to which the Act applies, to allow the Commission to provide directions on communication, to provide that the Code of Conduct be laid before the Oireachtas; to provide the Commission with further powers to investigate and report on breaches of the Code of Conduct; to extend the cooling-off period to two years, to extend the scope of section 22 of the Regulation of Lobbying Act 2015 and to make a failure to comply with that section an offence; to ensure that Designated Public Officials are aware of post-employment obligations; to allow the Commission to publish certain details regarding its decisions to waive or reduce the cooling-off; to provide for anti-avoidance clause be added to the list of relevant contraventions, and related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasuithe ar an Acht um Brústocaireacht a Rialáil, 2015 chun an míniú ar dhaoine lena mbaineann an tAcht a leathnú, chun a cheadú don Choimisiún ordacháin a sholáthar maidir le cumarsáid, chun socrú a dhéanamh go leagfar an Cód Iompair faoi bhráid an Oireachtais; do thabhairt cumhachtaí breise don Choimisiún chun imscrúdú a dhéanamh ar sháruithe ar an gCód Iompair agus chun tuarascáil a thabhairt ar an gcéanna; chun an tréimhse mharana a fhadú go dtí dhá bhliain, chun raon feidhme alt 22 den Acht um Brústocaireacht a Rialáil, 2015 a leathnú agus do dhéanamh cion de mhainneachtain an t-alt sin a chomhlíonadh; dá chinntiú go mbeidh Oifigigh Phoiblí Ainmnithe ar an eolas faoi oibleagáidí iarfhostaíochta; dá cheadú don Choimisiún mionsonraí áirithe a fhoilsiú maidir lena bhreitheanna an tréimhse mharana a tharscaoileadh nó a laghdú; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le clásal frithsheachanta a chur leis an liosta de sháruithe iomchuí, agus i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Brústocaireacht a Rialáil (Leasú), 2020
